messages.content: Thank you for contacting Nestlé customer service. My name is Fred. May I know your name, please?
It's Alex. And I'm not happy at all with your Nespresso Coffee Capsules.
I'm sorry to hear that, Alex. Could you please tell me what seems to be the issue with the Nespresso Coffee Capsules?
Honestly, it's not just the capsules. It's the whole brand image. I used to trust Nestlé, but now everything feels so commercialized and low-quality.
I understand your frustration, Alex, and I appreciate your feedback. Can you give me more details about what specifically is disappointing you about the Nespresso Coffee Capsules?
The capsules don't taste the same anymore. It's like the quality has dropped, and it feels like you guys are just cutting corners to save money.

I'm really sorry to hear that you feel that way, Alex. We strive to maintain high standards for our products. Have you noticed this change with a specific flavor, or is it all the capsules in general?
It's all of them! And it's not just me. I've talked to other people who feel the same way. What happened to the brand we used to love?

I understand, Alex, and it's important for us to hear such feedback. We take comments like these very seriously. While I can't change past experiences, I can assure you that I will escalate your concerns to our quality control team. Is there anything else specific you would like us to address?
Just make sure Nestlé knows people are noticing the decline. I want to see improvements, not just in the products but in the way the company presents itself. The trust is fading.

Thank you, Alex. I will make sure your feedback reaches the right people. We value your loyalty and hope to regain your trust. If you have any other concerns or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.
